jobDescription: Are you looking for an "Internship" where you can feel proud of your accomplishments and know you are making a difference in your community and your country? Join MorphoTrust, and you join a world-class team whose mission is to simplify, protect and secure the lives of the American people. We do this through innovative, market-leading identity technology solutions and services. We are "The Identity Company."  Imagine renewing your driver license through an app on your smartphone or using a digital driver license on your phone to prove your identity at a bank or retail store. Our secure credentialing solutions, vetting services, and world renowned biometric technologies, including face, fingerprint and iris images, will enable this in the near future and much more. Now you can take your chosen profession and apply your specific career skills to a technology driven company that is leading the future of identity solutions, and positively affecting the lives of your friends and family on a daily basis.  Now is the time to jump on board and join a company that is growing in a market that is rapidly expanding, evolving and growing in importance! That company is MorphoTrust! JOIN US NOW! Job Summary: This MBA Internship will require significant skills to analyze, track and report on data from multiple sources, and then collaborate on making recommendations for process improvements and improving efficiencies that will lead to cost reductions and profit gains.You may also be involved in helping to analyze and evaluate federal and state contracts that will ultimately result in revenue and profit growth. MorphoTrust fingerprints bout 3 million customers each year and are the prime contractor for the TSA's Universal Enrollment Service (UES), as well as the leading provider of fingerprinting services to numerous agencies and commercial businesses across all 50 states.
